name: Flame Noble Knight Roland
desc: (Quick Effect): You can target 1 face-up monster you control; equip this card from your hand to that target you control as an Equip Card with this effect; it gains 500 ATK. During the End Phase, if this card was sent to the GY during this turn: You can add 1 FIRE Warrior monster or Equip Spell from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Flame Noble Knight Roland" once per turn.
